Comments_Questions: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
Comments_List: I learned a lot about German culture and new vocabulary as well.
I greatly improved my German skills, both my understanding and production of the language.
I think that the pace was too fast. We covered too many things at once and they were done on a more superficial level.

The textbook and the course are very interactive and fun. Our small size also made the class even more interactive, and I really enjoyed getting to know my classmates. I think sometimes some class periods are a little to fast-paced, and some book exercises are not too helpful, but these are very small issues in an overall incredible course!
Yes it is very useful for improvement of the German language. Also it is very interesting since the topics are very interesting.

I would definitely recommend this course to anyone who wants to improve their German skills. I think this is the first language course where you get to actually develop your own ideas and have discussions, which is incredibly helpful.
